name: Windows 3D Maze Screensaver Game
description:
The game is the same as the original screensaver.
The goal of the game to reach the exit marker.
Some objects will flip you upside down.

More info in the readme file.

Sources:
https://www.spriters-resource.com/pc_computer/3dmazescreensaver/
https://github.com/greggman/hsva-unity

Minimum system requirements:
- Windows 7 or newer
- .Net Framework 4.5
- 1024 MB RAM
- 2.0 Ghz CPU
- Nvidia 9500 GT
- 60 MB free space
- 30 MB after install

GitHub: https://github.com/kurtis2222/Win3DMaze
